edu.iastate.cs228.hw5

Class GraphUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iastate.cs228.hw5.GraphUtil

  • public class GraphUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class which calculates paths and distances within a Graph. This class is complete and should not be modified
    Author:
    Caleb Brose

      static <V> java.util.Map<V,java.lang.Integer> getDistancesFrom(Graph<V> g, V s)
      Calculates distances from vertex s to all other vertices in g using a breadth-first-search.
      static <V> java.lang.Iterable<V> getPath(Graph<V> g, V s, V t)
      Finds a path from s to t in g by performing a depth-first-search.

    • Method Detail

      • getDistancesFrom

        public static <V> java.util.Map<V,java.lang.Integer> getDistancesFrom(Graph<V> g,
                                                      V s)
        Calculates distances from vertex s to all other vertices in g using a breadth-first-search. If a vertex is not reachable, its distance is Integer.MAX_VALUE.
        Parameters:
        g - - the Graph to traverse
        s - - the vertex to start the traversal from
        Returns:
        a Map of the distances from s to all reachable vertices, null if s is not a vertex in g

      • getPath

        public static <V> java.lang.Iterable<V> getPath(Graph<V> g,
                                V s,
                                V t)
        Finds a path from s to t in g by performing a depth-first-search.
        Parameters:
        g - - the Graph to traverse
        s - - the start vertex
        t - - the destination vertex
        Returns:
        a path from s to t if it exists, null otherwise
